Function Documentation

u32 _AFIO_ClockControl ( ControlStatus  Cmd)

Turn on/Turn off AFIO clock.

Parameters:
Cmd,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
TRUEor FALSE (TRUE: already turn on, FALSE, Turn on by this call)

u32 _GPIO_ClockControl ( HT_GPIO_TypeDef *  HT_GPIOx,
ControlStatus  Cmd 
)

Turn on/Turn off specify GPIO clock.

Parameters:
HT_GPIOx,:where HT_GPIOx is the selected GPIO from the GPIO peripherals.
Cmd,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
TRUEor FALSE (TRUE: already turn on, FALSE, Turn on by this call)
